Prep Time: 10 Minutes
Cook Time: 20 Minutes
Ready In: 30 Minutes
Servings: 12

Ingredients:
1/4 cup all-purpose flour
1 cup milk
1 pinch salt
3 eggs

½ teaspoon ground cinnamon
½ teaspoon nutmeg
1 teaspoon vanilla extract
1 tablespoon white sugar
12 thick slices bread

Directions:
1. Measure flour into a large mixing bowl. Slowly whisk in the milk.
Whisk in the salt, eggs, cinnamon, vanilla extract and sugar until
smooth.
2. Heat a lightly oiled griddle or frying pan over medium heat.
3. Soak bread slices in mixture until saturated. Cook bread on each
side until golden brown. Serve hot.
